>>===== MODE =====>>
bibliography
<<===== MODE =====<<


>>===== DESCRIPTION =====>>
<https://github.com/zepinglee/citeproc-lua/issues/99>
<<===== DESCRIPTION =====<<


>>===== RESULT =====>>
<div class="csl-bib-body">
  <div class="csl-entry">Parlamentsdirektion (1966): <i>Stenographisches Protokoll der 20. Sitzung des Nationalrats vom 8. Juli 1966 (20/NRSITZ XI. GP)</i>. In: <i>Parlament: Protokolle</i>. Link: https://www.parlament.gv.at/gegenstand/XI/NRSITZ/20 (letzter Zugriff: 5.8.2025).</div>
  <div class="csl-entry">Stepan, Max (2024): <i>2024 Bringt neuerlich eine Flut an Volksbegehren</i>. In: <i>derStandard.at</i>. Link: https://www.derstandard.at/story/3000000202567/2024-bringt-neuerlich-eine-flut-an-volksbegehren (letzter Zugriff: 5.8.2025).</div>
</div>

>>===== CSL =====>>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" version="1.0" demote-non-dropping-particle="sort-only" default-locale="de-AT">
  <!-- This style was edited with the Visual CSL Editor (https://editor.citationstyles.org/visualEditor/) -->
  <info>
    <title>MW-Bachelorarbeit</title>
    <title-short>MW</title-short>
    <id>http://www.zotero.org/styles/mw-bachelorarbeit</id>
    <link rel="self" href="http://www.zotero.org/styles/mw-bachelorarbeit"/>
    <author>
      <name>kishbishmw</name>
    </author>
    <category citation-format="author-date"/>
    <category field="social_science"/>
    <summary>MW-Bachelorarbeit</summary>
    <updated>2025-08-13T11:38:45+08:00</updated>
  </info>
  <locale xml:lang="de">
    <terms>
      <term name="et-al">et al.</term>
      <term name="ibid">ebd.</term>
    </terms>
  </locale>
  <macro name="editor">
    <names variable="editor" delimiter=", ">
      <name name-as-sort-order="all" sort-separator=", " delimiter-precedes-last="always" delimiter="/">
        <name-part name="family" font-style="normal"/>
      </name>
      <label form="short" text-case="capitalize-first" strip-periods="true" prefix=" (" suffix=".):"/>
    </names>
  </macro>
  <macro name="anon">
    <text term="anonymous" form="short" text-case="capitalize-first" strip-periods="true"/>
  </macro>
  <macro name="author">
    <names variable="author" font-style="normal">
      <name font-style="normal" delimiter="/" delimiter-precedes-last="always" name-as-sort-order="all">
        <name-part name="family" font-style="normal"/>
      </name>
      <label form="short" prefix=" (" suffix=")" text-case="capitalize-first"/>
      <substitute>
        <names variable="editor"/>
        <text macro="anon"/>
      </substitute>
    </names>
  </macro>
  <macro name="author-short">
    <names variable="author">
      <name form="short" delimiter="/" delimiter-precedes-last="always" initialize-with=". "/>
      <substitute>
        <names variable="editor"/>
        <names variable="translator"/>
        <text macro="anon"/>
      </substitute>
    </names>
  </macro>
  <macro name="access">
    <choose>
      <if variable="DOI" match="any">
        <group>
          <text value="DOI: " suffix=" "/>
          <text variable="DOI"/>
          <group prefix=" (" suffix=")">
            <text value="letzter Zugriff:" suffix=" "/>
            <date variable="accessed">
              <date-part name="day" suffix="."/>
              <date-part name="month" suffix="." form="numeric"/>
              <date-part name="year"/>
            </date>
          </group>
        </group>
      </if>
      <else-if match="any" variable="URL">
        <group>
          <text value="Link: "/>
          <text variable="URL"/>
          <group prefix=" (" suffix=")">
            <text value="letzter Zugriff:"/>
            <date variable="accessed" prefix=" ">
              <date-part name="day" suffix="."/>
              <date-part name="month" form="numeric" suffix="."/>
              <date-part name="year"/>
            </date>
          </group>
        </group>
      </else-if>
    </choose>
  </macro>
  <macro name="title">
    <text variable="title" font-style="italic"/>
  </macro>
  <macro name="publisher">
    <group delimiter=": ">
      <text variable="publisher-place"/>
      <text variable="publisher"/>
    </group>
  </macro>
  <macro name="year-date">
    <choose>
      <if variable="issued">
        <date variable="issued">
          <date-part name="year"/>
        </date>
      </if>
      <else>
        <text term="no date" form="short"/>
      </else>
    </choose>
  </macro>
  <macro name="edition">
    <choose>
      <if is-numeric="edition">
        <group delimiter=" ">
          <number prefix="(" variable="edition" form="ordinal"/>
          <text term="edition" suffix=")."/>
        </group>
      </if>
      <else>
        <text variable="edition" suffix="."/>
      </else>
    </choose>
  </macro>
  <macro name="pages">
    <text variable="page" prefix="S. "/>
  </macro>
  <macro name="editor (book)">
    <names variable="editor" delimiter=", ">
      <name delimiter="/" delimiter-precedes-last="always" name-as-sort-order="all">
        <name-part name="family"/>
      </name>
      <label form="short" text-case="capitalize-first" strip-periods="true" prefix=" (" suffix=".)."/>
    </names>
  </macro>
  <citation et-al-min="4" et-al-use-first="1" disambiguate-add-names="true" disambiguate-add-givenname="true" disambiguate-add-year-suffix="true">
    <layout prefix="(" suffix=")" delimiter="; ">
      <choose>
        <if position="ibid-with-locator">
          <group delimiter=", ">
            <text term="ibid" text-case="lowercase"/>
            <text variable="locator" prefix="S. "/>
          </group>
        </if>
        <else-if position="ibid">
          <text term="ibid" text-case="lowercase"/>
        </else-if>
        <else>
          <group delimiter=", ">
            <group delimiter=" ">
              <text macro="author-short"/>
              <text macro="year-date"/>
            </group>
            <group>
              <text variable="locator" prefix="S. "/>
            </group>
          </group>
        </else>
      </choose>
    </layout>
  </citation>
  <bibliography et-al-min="5" et-al-use-first="4" entry-spacing="0" hanging-indent="true">
    <sort>
      <key macro="author"/>
      <key macro="year-date"/>
      <key variable="title"/>
    </sort>
    <layout suffix=".">
      <text macro="author"/>
      <date date-parts="year" variable="issued" prefix=" (" suffix="):">
        <date-part name="year"/>
      </date>
      <choose>
        <if type="bill book graphic legal_case legislation motion_picture report song" match="any">
          <group delimiter=" " prefix=" " suffix=".">
            <group delimiter=" ">
              <text macro="title"/>
              <text variable="genre" prefix="(" suffix=")"/>
            </group>
            <text macro="edition"/>
            <text macro="editor (book)"/>
          </group>
          <text prefix=" " macro="publisher"/>
        </if>
        <else-if type="chapter paper-conference" match="any">
          <text macro="title" prefix=" " suffix="."/>
          <group prefix=" " delimiter=" ">
            <text term="in" text-case="capitalize-first" suffix=":"/>
            <text macro="editor"/>
            <text variable="container-title" font-style="italic"/>
            <text macro="pages" prefix="(" suffix=")."/>
            <choose>
              <if match="all" variable="collection-number">
                <group>
                  <text variable="collection-title" font-style="italic" prefix="Reihe: "/>
                  <text variable="collection-number" prefix=" (Nr. " suffix=")."/>
                </group>
              </if>
            </choose>
            <choose>
              <if match="none" variable="collection-number">
                <group suffix=".">
                  <text variable="collection-title" font-style="italic" prefix="Reihe: "/>
                  <text variable="collection-number"/>
                </group>
              </if>
            </choose>
            <text variable="event" suffix="."/>
            <group delimiter=". ">
              <text macro="publisher"/>
            </group>
          </group>
        </else-if>
        <else-if type="thesis">
          <group prefix=" " suffix=".">
            <text macro="title"/>
            <text variable="genre" prefix=" (" suffix="). "/>
            <text macro="publisher"/>
          </group>
        </else-if>
        <else>
          <group suffix=".">
            <text macro="title" prefix=" "/>
            <text macro="editor" prefix=" "/>
          </group>
          <group prefix=" ">
            <choose>
              <if type="webpage post-weblog" match="any">
                <text term="available at" plural="true" text-case="capitalize-first" suffix=": "/>
                <text variable="container-title" font-style="italic"/>
              </if>
              <else>
                <text term="in" text-case="capitalize-first" suffix=": "/>
                <text variable="container-title" font-style="italic"/>
              </else>
            </choose>
            <group>
              <choose>
                <if match="all" variable="issue volume page">
                  <text variable="volume" prefix=" (Bd. "/>
                  <text variable="issue" prefix="/Nr. "/>
                  <text variable="page" prefix=", S. " suffix=")"/>
                </if>
                <else-if match="all" variable="issue page">
                  <text variable="issue" prefix=" (Nr. "/>
                  <text variable="page" prefix=", S. " suffix=")"/>
                </else-if>
                <else-if match="all" variable="volume page">
                  <text variable="volume" prefix=" (Bd. "/>
                  <text variable="page" prefix=", S. " suffix=")"/>
                </else-if>
                <else-if match="any" variable="issue">
                  <text variable="issue" prefix=" (Nr. " suffix=")"/>
                </else-if>
                <else-if match="any" variable="volume">
                  <text variable="volume" prefix=" (Bd. " suffix=")"/>
                </else-if>
              </choose>
            </group>
          </group>
        </else>
      </choose>
      <text macro="access" prefix=". "/>
    </layout>
  </bibliography>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<
